record.field: Supplier Location of company's party "%(party)s" is empty but it is required to create the arrival stock move for a new animal/group.
The warehouse location "%(location)s" doesn't have set production location, but it is required to create the arrival stock move for a new animal.
The specified farm "%(farm)s" is not configured as farm with groups for the specie "%(specie)s".
The event "%(event)s" is trying to move the group "%(group)s" to location "%(location)s", but the location's warehouse is not configured as a farm for this kind of animals.
Birthdate "%(birth)s" can not be after arrival date "%(arrival)s"
Insemination date "%(insemination)s" on line "%(line)s" can not be before arrival date "%(arrival)s".
Abort date "%(abort)s" on line "%(line)s" can not be before insemination date "%(insemination)s".
Farrowing date "%(farrowing)s" on line "%(line)s" can not be before insemination date "%(insemination)s".
Weaning date "%(weaning)s" on line "%(line)s" can not be before farrowing date "%(farrowing)s".
Line "%(line)s" misses its weaning event.
Live, stillborn, muffied and weaned quantity on line "%(line)s" must be grether than zero.
On line "%(line)s" there are more fostered animals than live.
On line "%(line)s" there are more weaned animals than live.
The specified farm "%(farm)s" is not configured as farm with "%(animal_type)s" for the specie "%(specie)s".
The required sequence "%(sequence_field)s" is not set in the farm line "%(farm_line)s".
The event "%(event)s" is trying to move the animal "%(animal)s" to location "%(location)s", but the location's warehouse is not configured as a farm for this kind of animals.
The required product "%(product_field)s" is not set in the farm "%(farm)s".
A female animal with the same number (%(number)s) already exists in this farm.
The date of the cycle is before the one of the precious cycle.
The Name of the Tag must be unique.
The location "%(location)s" don't have a warehouse.
The Semen Dose BOM "%(bom)s" doesn't have any input for the Specie's Semen Product.
The quality test "%(test)s" can't be set to "Draft" because it is related to a validated semen extraction event.
The action "Create menus and actions" has been launched for the specie "%(specie)s" but it does not have any animal type enabled.
The Semen's Product of the Specie must be unique.
Breed name must be unique per specie.
The Farm of Managed Farms of an specie must be unique.
The Abort Event must be unique.
The Female Cycle must be unique.
The farrowing event "%(event)s" has 0 in Dead and Live. It has to have some unit in some of these fields.
The value of "Live" must to be positive.
The value of "Stillborn" must to be positive.
The value of "Mummified" must to be positive.
The Farrowing Event must be unique.
The Female Cycle must be unique.
The Animal Group must be unique.
The Timestamp must be after the Start Date
In Feed Events, the quantity can't be zero.
In Feed Events, the quantity must be 1 for Animals (not Groups).
In Feed Events, the quantity must be positive (greater or equal to 1).
The medication event "%(event)s" is trying to move %(quantity)s of lot "%(lot)s" from silo "%(location)s" but there is not enough quantity there at "%(timestamp)s".
The medication event "%(event)s" is trying to move %(quantity)s of product "%(product)s" from silo "%(location)s" but there isn't enough quantity there at "%(timestamp)s".
The event of animal "%(animal)s" is trying to move it from location "%(from_location)s" but it isn't there at "%(timestamp)s".
The event of group "%(group)s" is trying to move "%(quantity)s" animals from location "%(from_location)s" but there isn't enough there at "%(timestamp)s".
In Medication Events, the quantity can't be zero.
In Medication Events, the quantity must be 1 for Animals (not Groups).
In Medication Events, the quantity must be positive (greater or equal to 1).
In Move Events, the quantity can't be zero.
In Move Events, the quantity must be 1 for Animals (not Groups).
In Move Events, the weight must be positive (greater or equal to 1).
The entered quantity is incorrect, the maximum allowed quantity is: %(quantity)s
The event "%(event)s" can't be deleted because is not in "Draft" state.
The date of the event is set in the future.
The Weaning Event must be unique.
The Female Cycle must be unique.
The event "%(event)s" has no farrowing group".
The farrowing group of foster event "%(event)s" doesn't have %(quantity)s units in location "%(location)s" at "%(timestamp)s".
The farrowing group of the pair female of foster event "%(event)s" doesn't have %(quantity)s units in location "%(location)s" at "%(timestamp)s".
There are other removal validated events for the animal "%(animal)s".
In Removal Events, the quantity must be positive (greater or equal to 1.
In Removal Events, the quantity must be 1 for Animals (not Groups).
The inventory "%(inventory)s" can't be deleted because is not in "Draft" or "Cancelled" state.
The quantity specified in feed inventory "%(inventory)s" is not correct.\nThe current stock of this silo is %(curr_qty)s. The quantity in the inventory must to be less than the current stock.
The date of feed inventory "%(inventory)s" is too soon. This should be at least two days after the previous inventory to have enough data.
There hasn't been any animal in destination locations of Feed Inventory "%(inventory)s" since %(start_date)s to inventory's date.
There are real inventories after the provisional inventory "%(inventory)s" you are trying to confirm.
There isn't any Feed Inventory before the feed provisional inventory "%(inventory)s" you are trying to confirm.
The Animal and Event Type of Event Order "%(order)s" are incompatibles.
The specified farm "%(farm)s" is not configured as farm with "%(animal_type)s" for the specie "%(specie)s".
The Reference of the Event Order is required.
The Reference of the Event Order must be unique.
There isn't any unit of dose "%(dose)s" selected in the insemination event "%(event)s" in the farm "%(farm)s" at "%(timestamp)s".
The sum of semen quantity in the doses of semen extraction event "%(event)s" is greater than the semen produced quantity.
The semen extraction event "%(event)s" already has defined doses.\nPlease empty the list before click to calculate them by the system.
The semen extraction event "%(event)s" doesn't have any produced dose defined.\nIt can't be validated.
The Quality Test "%(test)s" of semen extraction event "%(event)s" did not succeed.\nPlease, check its values and try to it again.
Missing Quality Template for product "%(product)s".
The semen extraction dose "%(dose)s" can't be deleted because is not in "Draft" state.
In Semen Extraction Events, the quantity must be positive (greater or equal to 1.
The Semen Extraction Event must be unique.
The Quality Test must be unique.
In Semen Extraction Doses, the Line Num. must be unique in a event.
In Semen Extraction Doses, the Container must be unique in a event.
In Semen Extraction Doses, the Quantity must be positive (greater than 0).
In Transformation Events, the quantity must be positive (greater or equal to 1)
In Transformation Events, the quantity must be 1 for Animals (not Groups).
In reclassification event "%(event)s", the product "%(product)s" is already set to the animal
Reclassification Event "%(event)s" already has the related stock moves: IN: "%(in_move)s", OUT: "%(out_move)s"
